mapper.select: select v.v_name, vb.start_date, vb.end_date from voucher v, voucher_buying vb where v.v_num=vb.v_num
mapper.insert: insert into voucher_buying(member_number, v_num, start_date, end_date) values(#{m_num},ticket_seq.nextval,to_char(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'),#{end_date})

insert into payment_info(member_number, kinds_of_card, card_num, exp,c_password) values (#{m_num},#{card},#{cardNumber1}||'-'||#{cardNumber2}||'-'||#{cardNumber3}||'-'||#{cardNumber4},#{month}||'-'||#{year},#{password})
